Action.author: nnao
Action.body: http://www-us.apache.org/dist/kafka/ only contains the latest versions, so https://archive.apache.org/dist/kafka/ is better to use for the older versions

Action.author: sheehan
Action.body: I agree with ~nnao , the URL should be changed to https://archive.apache.org/dist/kafka/ otherwise this will happen again in the future.

Action.author: kchristidis
Action.body: Any concerns of this biting us again in the future are overrated since FAB-7045 will ensure we're building the images only once. That said, I agree that switching to the archive URI is the way to go.
